author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

In reply to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48768#issuecomment-3216998592, update the menu used in the `test_hltMenuContentToCSVs` unit test to a version without `SwitchProducerCUDA`
 
#### PR validation:

None, the bot will do the testing

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: update menu used in `test_hltMenuContentToCSVs`
